page.title: 03Thistle Centre Stirling
page.content: The Thistle Centre is a very modern shopping precinct. It is a busy centre and all the big stores such as Boots, Woolworths, Frasers and Debenhams are there. In the middle of the streets there are rockeries, benches and litter bins. All the shops in the Thistle Centre are glass fronted so people can glance through the windows without going into the shop as there is always a display in the window. In all, there are 40 shops, 5 department stores and a few restaurants. The centre has a good security system and there are quite a few uniformed men looking out for trouble makers. If they see them they will contact their colleagues on their Walkie-Talkies and put an end to the troublemaking. Central heating makes the centre a pleasant place to shop in winter.
